alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 30 at 8:44AM CDT until October 31 at 7:27AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Henderson and Navarro Counties. Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Ellis and Kaufman Counties. Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River near Rosser. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Minor to moderate flooding of low areas and roads within the levees is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 33.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 31.0 feet. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling below action stage or 20 feet on Wednesday. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
